cards.rules_text:

Hexproof

cards.rules_text:
If a creature would die, exile it instead with an ancestry counter on it.
Kahroba gets +X/+X, where X is the total power of creature cards exiled with ancestry counters on them.

cards.rules_text2:
Flying, hexproof
At the beginning of your end step, put an exiled card with an ancestry counter on it on the bottom of its owner’s library, then scry 2. If there is exactly one card exiled with an ancestry counter on it, transform Atieh.

cards.rules_text:

At the beginning of your end step, transform Sahra unless you’ve sacrificed two or more permanents this turn.
cards.rules_text2:
Indestructible
Whenever Cyrukan attacks, choose one —
• Create a Treasure token. [i](It’s an artifact with “{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.”)[/i]
• Create a Weapon token and attach it to target creature you control. [i](It’s an Equipment artifact with equip {2} and “Equipped creature gets +1/+1.”)[/i]
At the beginning of each end step, if you control three or more tokens, transform Cyrukan.

cards.rules_text:
Whenever you cast a creature spell, create a 2/1 white Sand creature token with flying.
Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, create a 3/1 red Sand creature token with haste.
Whenever you cast an enchantment or artifact spell, create a 2/2 blue Sand creature token with hexproof.
Whenever a land you control enters, create a 3/3 green Sand creature token.
